structure.unit: ARTICLE C. - USE OF SANITARY SEWER SYSTEM [4]

text.section: It is the purpose of this Division to provide for the recovery of costs from users of the City's waste water disposal system for the implementation of the program established herein.

The applicable charges or fees shall be set forth in the City's schedule of charges and fees. A copy of these charges and fees will be made available from the POTW Director. (Ord. No. 2011-981, ยง1, 12-6-11)
